title: DESCRIBE DATABASE | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Describes the database. For example, shows the schemas in the database.
DESCRIBE can be abbreviated to DESC.

In addition to SQL, you can also use other interfaces, such as Snowflake REST APIs, Snowflake Python APIs, and Snowflake CLI.
See Alternate interfaces.
ALTER DATABASE , CREATE DATABASE , DROP DATABASE , SHOW DATABASES , UNDROP DATABASE
Specifies the identifier of the database to describe.
To post-process the output of this command, you can use the RESULT_SCAN function, which treats the output as a table that can be queried.
